name: WebRepo
description:
WebRepo provides easy access to projects from the community.

WebRepo 2.0 ups the ante with a brand new UI and a simplified submission/review process all from within the app itself.
No more nasty Google forms!

Other new features include:
- Light & Dark Themes
- Integrated Submit & Review
- No more pesky Github login!
- Support for multiple versions of a single project (only one version installed at a time)
- Automatic dependency inclusion
update_notes:
- Sort app list tabs by timestamp
- Include dependencies of projects automatically when submitting
- Fix news & app list project install buttons
- Open forum links in Codea rather than opening the browser app
- Remove redundant file
- Add settings screen
- Fix clipping issue with nested scrolls
- Restore last submitted values when selecting a project on the submission screen
